extendedInfo.description: This is a Scorepad for the FIRST FRC Logomotion 2011 competition.  It will allow teams to consider on different scoring strategies during the early part of the build season.PRESS the dots to place game pieces.  Each PRESS will cycle through the different pieces (EMPTY, TRIANGLE, CIRCLE, RECTANGLE.  LONG PRESS the dots to place the uber tubes that are only placed during the autonomous period.  These tubes score points in the autonomous period and double the game pieces placed during the teleop period.PRESS the race results to cycle through the different race results (None, Fourth, Third, Second, First)FIRST is an organization dedicated to inspire young people to be science and technology leaders.

reviews.comment: Thank you FIRST Team 999! This will be very helpful for FIRST Team 3168\'s strategy and understanding the game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is really going to help FIRST Team Crash 999. I am the developer.
reviews.author: A Google User
